PerformanceMeasureUserAgentSpecificMemor.summary: The measureUserAgentSpecificMemory() method is used to estimate the memory usage of a web application including all its iframes and workers.

remarks.para:
-
-Monitor your web page's total memory usage with measureUserAgentSpecificMemory() - web.dev

PerformanceMeasureUserAgentSpecificMemor.returns: A that resolves to an object containing the following properties:An example return value looks like this:
